Barricade.title: Barricade
Barricade.notable_trait: Often accompanied by the mini-con Frenzy

Blackout.title: Blackout
Blackout.notable_trait: Responsible for one of the first Decepticon attacks on Earth

Bonecrusher.title: Bonecrusher
Bonecrusher.notable_trait: Known for his hatred of everything

Bumblebee.title: Bumblebee
Bumblebee.notable_trait: Lost his voice box, communicates through radio clips

Frenzy.title: Frenzy
Frenzy.notable_trait: Infiltrates systems by transforming into a stereo or cellphone

Ironhide.title: Ironhide
Ironhide.notable_trait: Wields heavy artillery and has a no-nonsense attitude

Jazz.title: Jazz
Jazz.notable_trait: Loves Earth culture and speaks with a cool demeanor

Megatron.title: Megatron
Megatron.notable_trait: Founder and ruthless leader of the Decepticons

Optimus Prime.title: Optimus Prime
Optimus Prime.notable_trait: Carries the Matrix of Leadership and believes in freedom for all

Ratchet.title: Ratchet
Ratchet.vehicle: Hummer H2 Search and Rescue Vehicle
Ratchet.notable_trait: Serves as the Autobot field medic and engineer

Starscream.title: Starscream
Starscream.notable_trait: Ambitious and treacherous, always seeking to replace Megatron
